javadoc:
Local variables visible to a function.  This includes mapped (on the stack) and
 unmapped (only stored in a register).

methods.javadoc:
@param highFunc HighFunction the local variables are defined within.
@param spcname space name the local variables are defined within.
methods.name: <init>

params.name: highFunc
params.comment: HighFunction the local variables are defined within.

params.name: spcname
params.comment: space name the local variables are defined within.

methods.javadoc:
Populate the local variable map from information attached to the Program DB's function.
@param includeDefaultNames is true if default symbol names should be considered locked
methods.name: grabFromFunction
methods.comment: Populate the local variable map from information attached to the Program DB's function.

params.name: includeDefaultNames
params.comment: is true if default symbol names should be considered locked

methods.name: parseScopeXML
methods.comment: Parse a local symbol scope in XML from the localdb tag.

methods.name: parseSymbolList
methods.comment: Add mapped symbols to this LocalVariableMap, by parsing the symbollist and mapsym tags.

methods.javadoc: @return an XML document string representing this local variable map.
methods.name: buildLocalDbXML

return.comment: an XML document string representing this local variable map.

methods.name: getSymbols
methods.comment:
Get all the symbols mapped for this program, Param, Locals.
 The HighSymbol can either be a HighParam, or HighLocal

return.comment: an iterator over all mapped symbols.

methods.name: findLocal
methods.comment: Find any local variable (including input params) by address

params.name: pc
params.comment:
= Address of first use, or null if address
             is valid throughout the entire scope

methods.name: findLocal
methods.comment: Find any local variable (including input params) by address

params.name: pc
params.comment:
= Address of first use, or null if address
             is valid throughout the entire scope

methods.name: getSymbol
methods.comment: Lookup high variable based upon its symbol-id

return.comment: variable or null if not found

name: LocalSymbolMap
comment:
Local variables visible to a function.  This includes mapped (on the stack) and
 unmapped (only stored in a register).
